info.title: API Rewrite
info.summary: Référence de l'API Projets (Projets, clés API, modèles, webhooks).
info.description:
Référence publique complète des points de terminaison au niveau projet de l'API Rewrite v1.

Tous les endpoints renvoient une enveloppe cohérente (`ok`, `data` et `cursor` optionnel).
Utilisez soit un jeton Bearer (clé API) avec des scopes, soit une session cookie authentifiée.

tags.name: Templates
tags.description: Gérer des modèles SMS réutilisables avec variables.

data.name: order_shipped
data.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.

get.description:
Liste les modèles du projet avec pagination par curseur.

Utilisez `limit`, `after` et `before` pour paginer.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'GET',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
    },
)
print(response.json())

x-codeSamples.label: Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'GET');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
]);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("GET", null)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X GET 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'

value.name: order_shipped
value.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.

post.description: Crée un modèle réutilisable avec variables et valeurs de repli.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"name":"order_shipped","content":"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("POST", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
x-codeSamples.source:
let url = URL(string: "https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates")!
var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  -d '{"name":"order_shipped","content":"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}'

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: ID de modèle unique ou nom de modèle unique.

data.name: order_shipped
data.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.

value.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.

patch.description: Met à jour partiellement le contenu du modèle et/ou les variables.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PATCH');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"content":"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("PATCH", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
x-codeSamples.source:

var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "PATCH"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"content\":\"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PATCH 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'

  -d '{"content":"Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre colis {{order_id}} a été expédié.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}'

bearerAuth.description: Envoyez votre clé API via `Authorization: Bearer <api-key>`.

after.name: after
after.description: ID de curseur unique pour récupérer les éléments après cette valeur.

before.name: before
before.description: ID de curseur unique pour récupérer les éléments avant cette valeur.

persist.description: Indique si une autre page peut être demandée via `next`.

next.description: Curseur pour demander la page suivante (`after`).

Cursor.description: Métadonnées de curseur pour les réponses paginées.

data.description: Aucune donnée n'est renvoyée pour cette réponse.

OkEmptyResponse.description: Réponse réussie. Cet endpoint ne renvoie aucune donnée.

name.description: Clé de variable utilisée par votre application.

fallback.description: Valeur par défaut lorsque votre payload ne fournit pas la variable.

TemplateVariable.description: Variable nommée utilisée dans le corps d'un modèle.

Template.description: Métadonnées du modèle et instantané facultatif du contenu.

example.content: Bonjour {{first_name}}, votre commande {{order_id}} est en route.

TemplateUpdateBody.description: Modifier le contenu du modèle et/ou ses variables.
